nodes.text: Magnetic grappler boots were a type of specialized magnetic boot utilized by Purge troopers, and were designed to protect the wearer against being pulled or pushed by an opponent's force powers. Capable of operating on any surface (including non-metallic), these boots resisted against forced movement of any kind.
Unlike other magnetic boots that often stipulate terrain restrictions, Magnetic grappler boots grant a flat +5 to any forced movement, showing that they can be used anywhere.
